name: Response level
description: HL7 Standard Tables - Tables defined by the HL7 organization. Most tables in this category are related to the standard and its message structures.

values.description: Always.  All MFA segments (whether denoting errors or not) must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment message
Error/Reject conditions only.  Only MFA segments denoting errors must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment for this message
Success.  Only MFA segments denoting success must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment for this message
